titles.title: For the relief of Mr. Guy Lau and Ms. Chantal Lau Pease.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 6/11/1997--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to the son and daughter of a named individual in full satisfaction of any claim against the United States for payments for the lease by such individual of his hotel to the U.S. armed forces in Vietnam.
